Study Title: Radiotherapy for Malignant Astrocytomas in the Elderly
Brief Summary: A randomized trial comparing radiotherapy with supportive care in patients aged 70 years or older with newly diagnosed, histologically confirmed anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma, and a Karnofsky performance status \> 70.
Secondary Outcome Measures: Progression free survival|Quality of life|Cognitive functions
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Hôpital de la Salpêtrière, Paris, Ile de France, 75013, France
